title: Biden’s Student Loan Forgiveness Plan: Your Questions, Answered
description: President Biden’s move means the student loan balances of millions of people could fall by as much as $20,000. This F.A.Q. explains how it will work.
dc:creator: Ron Lieber and Tara Siegel Bernard
media:credit: Jonah Markowitz for The New York Times
media:description: Queens College in Flushing. Not everyone with debt will qualify for the student loan forgiveness plan.
